Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\db\oci\QueryBuilder

All Classes | Properties | Methods | Constants
Inheritanceyii\db\oci\QueryBuilder » yii\db\QueryBuilder » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Source Code
QueryBuilder is the query builder for Oracle databases.

Hide inherited properties

$separator string The separator between different fragments of a SQL statement yii\db\QueryBuilder
$typeMap array The abstract column types mapped to physical column types yii\db\QueryBuilder

Method Details

build() method
void build( $query )
$query

renameTable() method
string renameTable( $table, $newName )
$table string The table to be renamed. The name will be properly quoted by the method.
$newName string The new table name. The name will be properly quoted by the method.
return string the SQL statement for renaming a DB table.

Builds a SQL statement for renaming a DB table.

alterColumn() method
string alterColumn( $table, $column, $type )
$table string The table whose column is to be changed. The table name will be properly quoted by the method.
$column string The name of the column to be changed. The name will be properly quoted by the method.
$type string The new column type. The {@link getColumnType} method will be invoked to convert abstract column type (if any) into the physical one. Anything that is not recognized as abstract type will be kept in the generated SQL. For example, 'string' will be turned into 'varchar(255)', while 'string not null' will become 'varchar(255) not null'.
return string the SQL statement for changing the definition of a column.

Builds a SQL statement for changing the definition of a column.

dropIndex() method
string dropIndex( $name, $table )
$name string The name of the index to be dropped. The name will be properly quoted by the method.
$table string The table whose index is to be dropped. The name will be properly quoted by the method.
return string the SQL statement for dropping an index.

Builds a SQL statement for dropping an index.

resetSequence() method
void resetSequence( $table, $value = null )
$table
$value

buildLimit() method
void buildLimit( $limit, $offset )
$limit
$offset
